testimonials.name: Mihir Singh
testimonials.content: Arhaan Girdhar was a valuable Frontend Engineer during his tenure at IM. His expertise in Next.js was evident in the quality of his contributions to our platform. Significantly, Arhaan's frontend development work played a direct role in boosting user engagement, reflected in a clear increase in our Daily Active Users (DAUs). He's a results-oriented developer, and I confidently recommend him.

testimonials.name: Anbar Althaf
testimonials.content: Working with Arhaan on the project J.AR.V.I.S showcased his strategic vision, technical expertise, and unwavering commitment to excellence, elevating our results beyond expectations.
